message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $10000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer: I'll sell it to you for $11500. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value. Let me know if you're willing to meet me in the middle!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $10000. Would you be willing to meet me at $10750?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to make another compromise: I'll sell the product to you for $11200. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $10500?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking to save some more, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to make one more compromise: I'll sell the product to you for $11000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, so please let me know if this is something you'd be interested in!
